All Classes|All Packages

R

RandomEvent - Class in islandtrader.core
Represents the Random Events that the Trader may encounter while sailing.
RandomEvent(int, String, String) - Constructor for class islandtrader.core.RandomEvent
Creates a new RandomEvent
RandomEventService - Class in service
It is a helper service for the RandomEvents, it is used to create the RandomEvents that will be added to the routes in the IslandRepository (getRoutesForIsland(Island newIsland, RandomEventService res)), according to the percentage chance of encounter, which is not final to 100% so the Trader has a chance of nothing happening.
RandomEventService(ArrayList<Pirate>, ArrayList<RescuedSailor>, ArrayList<UnfortunateWeather>) - Constructor for class service.RandomEventService
Creates a new Random Event Service It receives a list of pirates, sailors and weatherList, so we don't need to provide it every time we need a list of random events.
randomEventSpecificAction(Trader) - Method in class islandtrader.core.Pirate
Generates the specific action when Trader encounters Pirate RandomEvent It calls the helper methods to the Trader play the dice and the consequences of each outcome.
randomEventSpecificAction(Trader) - Method in class islandtrader.core.RandomEvent
This method is to be implemented depending on each RandomEvent specific context.
randomEventSpecificAction(Trader) - Method in class islandtrader.core.RescuedSailor
From super RandomEvent class, this method gives the Trader a monetary reward.
randomEventSpecificAction(Trader) - Method in class islandtrader.core.UnfortunateWeather
The randomEvent specific action will apply damage to the Ship Health, based on endurance of Ship.
readInput(String) - Method in class islandtrader.ui.cmd.GameEnvironmentMessageHelper
 
readInputInteger(String) - Method in class islandtrader.ui.cmd.GameEnvironmentMessageHelper
read the input from user
removeAllCargoTradables() - Method in class islandtrader.core.Ship
Removes all StoreTradables from the collection of current StoreTradables when a RandomEvent Pirate takes all Trader goods.
removeAmountFromBalance(double) - Method in class islandtrader.core.Trader
Remove amount from Trader AccountBalance when Trader buys goods and upgrades.
removeEventFromRoute(RandomEvent) - Method in class islandtrader.core.Route
Removes the event from Route
removeTradable(StoreTradable) - Method in class islandtrader.core.Ship
removes the StoreTradable from the collection of current StoreTradables when Trader sells it.
repair() - Method in class islandtrader.core.Ship
Repairs the Ship by setting the currentHealthStatus to 100%
repository - package repository
 
RescuedSailor - Class in islandtrader.core
Represents the RandomEvent "Rescued Sailors", when the Traders have this encounters they are rewarded with a monetary amount, that will vary depending on the number of Rescued Sailors they save.
RescuedSailor(int, String, String, int, float) - Constructor for class islandtrader.core.RescuedSailor
Creates a new RescuedSailor event of type RandomEvent
resultOfEncounterMessage() - Method in class islandtrader.core.Pirate
Overrides the super resultOfEncounterMessage from RandomEvent class to the Pirate result of encounter event
resultOfEncounterMessage() - Method in class islandtrader.core.RandomEvent
A message used to inform the Trader of the outcome of the RandomEvent
resultOfEncounterMessage() - Method in class islandtrader.core.RescuedSailor
Overrides the super resultOfEncounterMessage from RandomEvent class to the RescuedSailor encounter event
resultOfEncounterMessage() - Method in class islandtrader.core.UnfortunateWeather
Overrides the super resultOfEncounterMessage from RandomEvent class to the UnfortunateWeather encounter event
Route - Class in islandtrader.core
Routes represents the routes that connect the Islands, each Route has 3 possible random events that could happen, or nothing happening is also possibility
Route(int, ArrayList<RandomEvent>) - Constructor for class islandtrader.core.Route
A Route object created with the possible randomEvents.
RouteInformationWindow - Class in islandtrader.ui.gui
The window with a detailed description about the available routes for other Islands
RouteInformationWindow(GameEnvironmentSwing, Trader) - Constructor for class islandtrader.ui.gui.RouteInformationWindow
Creates the route information window application.
